content:
# I have successfully crafted 1 stone furnace and my inventory now contains:
# - 1 stone furnace
# - 10 units of coal
# - 10 units of iron ore

# The next step is to set up the stone furnace to smelt the iron ore into iron plates. 
# I will place the stone furnace down and then load it with coal and iron ore.

# Place the stone furnace in the world
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace)

# Load the stone furnace with coal and iron ore
load_furnace(Prototype.StoneFurnace, fuel='coal', amount=5)  # Load 5 units of coal
load_furnace(Prototype.StoneFurnace, item='iron-ore', amount=10)  # Load all iron ore

# Start the smelting process
start_smelting(Prototype.StoneFurnace)

# Check the inventory to see the changes after smelting
print(f"Inventory after loading furnace: {inspect_inventory()}")
